name: Candy Creepers
description:
Play as a witch who has an ax, for a broom. Use it to fly through the air and to cut your enemies to pieces!  Also magic. 

An open-world hack’n’slash game where you fly through the air with your broom and then land to wreck havoc against the creatures coming to destroy your home. 

Also, steal candy from kiddies to replenish your magic. Candies are magic.
